metadata.title: CVE-2023-0698 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Out of bounds read in WebRTC in Google Chrome prior to 110.0.5481.77allowed a remote attacker to perform an out of bounds memory read via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0698` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

chromium-browser - 110.0.5481.100-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-browser-l10n - 110.0.5481.100-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-chromedriver - 110.0.5481.100-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 110.0.5481.100-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 110.0.5481.100-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: chromium-browser package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '110.0.5481.100-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
